Order - Appointment (NBN) Confirmed.description: Notifies the customer that their NBN appointment has been confirmed.

Order - Appointment (NBN) Changed.description: Notifies the customer that their NBN appointment details have been changed.

Order - New Appointment (NBN) Required.description: Informs the customer that a new NBN appointment needs to be booked.

Order NBN - Appointment Reschedule Requi.description: Requests the customer to reschedule their NBN appointment.

Order - Appointment (NBN) Reminder.description: Reminds the customer about their upcoming NBN appointment.

Order - Appointment (NBN) Cancelled.description: Notifies the customer that their NBN appointment has been cancelled.

Order NBN - Appointment Cancelled.description: Notifies the customer that their NBN appointment has been cancelled.

Order (NBN) - On Hold.description: Informs the customer that their NBN order is currently on hold.

Order (NBN) - Cancelled.description: Confirms that the NBN order has been cancelled.

Order NBN Activation - Cancelled.description: Confirms that the NBN activation order has been cancelled.

Order (NBN) - Rejected.description: Notifies the customer that their NBN order could not be processed.

Order NBN Activation - Rejected.description: Notifies the customer that their NBN activation order could not be processed.

Order NBN Terminate - Completed.description: Confirms that the NBN service has been terminated.

Order (NBN Plan Change) - Completed.description: Confirms that the NBN plan change has been completed.

Order (NBN Activation) - Completed.description: Confirms that the NBN service has been activated. Postgres delineator determines Fibre Upgrade or No Fibre Upgrade template.

Order NBN - Appointment Completed Fibre.description: Confirms that the customer's fibre upgrade has been completed successfully.

Order (NBN) - In Progress.description: Notifies the customer that their NBN service is in progress and has been scheduled.

Order NBN - NTD Installation Required.description: Informs the customer that an NBN appointment is required for their installation.
